text:
Chai Chidchob (,; 5 April 1928 – 24 January 2020) was a Thai politician. He was born in Surin Province. He served as the Speaker of the House of Representatives and President of the National Assembly from 2008 to 2011.
Chidchob died on 24 January 2020 in Buriram Province. He was 92.

annotations.surface_form: Speaker of the House of Representatives
